UVA Problems

WERTYU


	
#include <cstdio>
#include<map>
using namespace std;



int main() {
    char c;
    map<char, char> t;
    t[’ ‘] =    ‘ ‘;
    t[‘\n’] =   ‘\n’;
    t[‘1’] =    ‘`’;
    t[‘2’] =    ‘1’;
    t[‘3’] =    ‘2’;
    t[‘4’] =    ‘3’;
    t[‘5’] =    ‘4’;
    t[‘6’] =    ‘5’;
    t[‘7’] =    ‘6’;
    t[‘8’] =    ‘7’;
    t[‘9’] =    ‘8’;
    t[‘0’] =    ‘9’;
    t[’-‘] =    ‘0’;
    t[’=’] =    ‘-‘;
    t[‘W’] =    ‘Q’;
    t[‘E’] =    ‘W’;
    t[‘R’] =    ‘E’;
    t[‘T’] =    ‘R’;
    t[‘Y’] =    ‘T’;
    t[‘U’] =    ‘Y’;
    t[‘I’] =    ‘U’;
    t[‘O’] =    ‘I’;
    t[‘P’] =    ‘O’;
    t[’[’] =    ‘P’;
    t[’]’] =    ‘[’;
    t[’\’] =   ‘]’;
    t[‘S’] =    ‘A’;
    t[‘D’] =    ‘S’;
    t[‘F’] =    ‘D’;
    t[‘G’] =    ‘F’;
    t[‘H’] =    ‘G’;
    t[‘J’] =    ‘H’;
    t[‘K’] =    ‘J’;
    t[‘L’] =    ‘K’;
    t[’;’] =    ‘L’;
    t[’'’] =   ‘;’;
    t[‘X’] =    ‘Z’;
    t[‘C’] =    ‘X’;
    t[‘V’] =    ‘C’;
    t[‘B’] =    ‘V’;
    t[‘N’] =    ‘B’;
    t[‘M’] =    ‘N’;
    t[’,’] =    ‘M’;
    t[’.’] =    ‘,’;
    t[’/’] =    ‘.’;



while ((c = getchar()) != EOF) {
    putchar(t[c]);
}
return 0; }
